data.actual_result: The focus on the textfield is lost, but keyboard is still open for some reason
data.expected_result: Not sure whether multiple lines are supported in notes, if not then it should just close the keyboard I guess
data.short_description: In user note field, tapping on the Enter key loses the focus of field but the keyboard is still open
data.steps_to_repro: - Open any user profile - Tap on the "Note" text field - Tap the Enter key of your keyboard
